First of all why is the headshot sound effect literally the sound of a tactical nuke going off, its literally the most annoying thing ive ever heard, worse than getting danced on in fortnite after getting squadwiped. second of all, why have i spent almost a thousand dollars on cases in this game and the best skin ive pulled was worth 15 dollars meanwhile i have 2 friend that have spent a fraction of that and pulled gloves/knives. i understand that its literally gambling but it cant be more obvious that this game doesn't want me to get anything good.
